AU.name: Mega Man™ X
AU.description: When the Mega Man series made the technological leap from NES to Super Nintendo, so too did Mega Man himself. Set one hundred years after the original hero's adventures, Mega Man X stars a more powerful generation of robot known as X who - along with the maverick Zero - must take on a new threat: the reploids. Like Mega Man, X must battle through each thrilling stage and defeat the boss, to capture its weapon for his own. But unlike Mega Man, X can dash, climb walls and collect armour to upgrade his abilities! This is the US version of the game.

CH.name: Mega Man™ X
CH.description: Der technologische Sprung von NES zu Super Nintendo modernisierte nicht nur die Mega Man-Reihe, sondern auch Mega Man selbst. Einhundert Jahre nach den Abenteuern des ursprünglichen Helden übernimmt Mega Man X eine Hauptrolle in einer mächtigeren Robotergeneration, die als X bekannt ist. Gemeinsam mit Zero, einem Jäger abtrünniger Roboter, muss er sich einer neuen Bedrohung stellen: den Reploids. Wie Mega Man muss sich X durch jede nervenaufreibende Stage kämpfen und den Endgegner besiegen, um sich dessen Waffe anzueignen. Im Gegensatz zu Mega Man kann X aber auch sprinten, Wände erklimmen und Rüstungsteile erlangen, um seine Fähigkeiten zu verbessern! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

BE.name: Mega Man™ X
BE.description: Lorsque la série Mega Man a réalisé le bond technologique de la NES vers la Super Nintendo, Mega Man a lui aussi évolué. Mega Man X se déroule cent ans après les aventures de notre héros d'origine et a pour vedette un robot de nouvelle génération connu sous le nom de X. Avec l'aide du chasseur de rebelles Zero, il doit faire face à une nouvelle menace, les Réploïdes. Tout comme Mega Man, X doit se frayer un chemin à travers chacun des stages excitants puis vaincre le boss afin de s'emparer de son arme. Mais en plus, X peut accélérer, escalader les murs et même améliorer ses capacités ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

AT.name: Mega Man™ X
AT.description: Der technologische Sprung von NES zu Super Nintendo modernisierte nicht nur die Mega Man-Reihe, sondern auch Mega Man selbst. Einhundert Jahre nach den Abenteuern des ursprünglichen Helden übernimmt Mega Man X eine Hauptrolle in einer mächtigeren Robotergeneration, die als X bekannt ist. Gemeinsam mit Zero, einem Jäger abtrünniger Roboter, muss er sich einer neuen Bedrohung stellen: den Reploids. Wie Mega Man muss sich X durch jede nervenaufreibende Stage kämpfen und den Endgegner besiegen, um sich dessen Waffe anzueignen. Im Gegensatz zu Mega Man kann X aber auch sprinten, Wände erklimmen und Rüstungsteile erlangen, um seine Fähigkeiten zu verbessern! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

CA.name: Mega Man™ X
CA.description: Hundreds of years after his death, Dr. Light's final creation is discovered. Released from his capsule by Dr. Cain, "X" is born into the world of the future where robot rebellions are a thing of the past. But when Dr. Cain tries to implement Dr. Light's designs into a new series of Reploids, something goes horribly wrong. Now, the future lies on the brink of destruction and X must use all of his newfound powers and abilities to hunt down the maverick Reploids and their leader, Sigma, before the human race is wiped from the planet!

ES.name: Mega Man™ X
ES.description: Cuando la saga Mega Man dio el salto de la NES a la nueva Super Nintendo, tanto ella como su protagonista experimentaron un importante cambio tecnológico. Mega Man X se desarrolla cien años después de que las aventuras del Mega Man original tuvieran lugar. El protagonista es X, un robot de una nueva generación que debe hacer frente a la amenaza de los reploides con la ayuda de Zero, un cazador de robots rebeldes. Al igual que Mega Man, X deberá abrirse camino a través de fases llenas de peligros y derrotar a los jefes finales para hacerse con sus armas. Sin embargo, X está un paso por delante de Mega Man y puede esprintar, escalar muros y conseguir piezas que mejoran sus habilidades. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Mega Man™ X
IT.description: Quando la serie Mega Man si è evoluta passando dal NES al Super Nintendo, l'omonimo protagonista non è certo rimasto indietro! Ambientato cento anni dopo gli eventi del primo episodio, Mega Man X vede l'arrivo di X, potente robot di nuova generazione, impegnato insieme al cacciatore di ribelli Zero ad affrontare una nuova minaccia: i Reploid. Anche in questa avventura, dovrai farti strada tra accattivanti livelli e sconfiggere i vari boss per acquisire le loro armi. A differenza del primo episodio, X è in grado di scattare in avanti, scalare pareti e integrare nel suo corpo cibernetico vari potenziamenti! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

GR.name: Mega Man™ X

BR.name: Mega Man™ X
BR.description: Centenas de anos após a sua morte, a criação final do Dr. Light é descoberta. Libertado da sua cápsula pelo Dr. Cain, “X” é trazido ao mundo do futuro, onde as rebeliões de robôs são coisas do passado. Mas quando Dr. Cain tenta pôr em prática os projetos do Dr. Light para criar uma nova série de Reploids, algo dá muito errado. Agora o futuro está na iminência da destruição e o “X” precisa usar todos os seus poderes e habilidades recentemente descobertos, para acabar com os Reploids rebeldes e o seu líder, Sigma, antes que a raça humana seja destruída!

BG.name: Mega Man™ X
BG.description: When the Mega Man series made the technological leap from NES to Super Nintendo, so too did Mega Man himself. Set one hundred years after the original hero's adventures, Mega Man X stars a more powerful generation of robot known as X who - along with the maverick Zero - must take on a new threat: the reploids. Like Mega Man, X must battle through each thrilling stage and defeat the boss, to capture its weapon for his own. But unlike Mega Man, X can dash, climb walls and collect armour to upgrade his abilities! This is the US version of the game.

CY.name: Mega Man™ X
CY.description: When the Mega Man series made the technological leap from NES to Super Nintendo, so too did Mega Man himself. Set one hundred years after the original hero's adventures, Mega Man X stars a more powerful generation of robot known as X who - along with the maverick Zero - must take on a new threat: the reploids. Like Mega Man, X must battle through each thrilling stage and defeat the boss, to capture its weapon for his own. MT.name: Mega Man™ X
MT.description: When the Mega Man series made the technological leap from NES to Super Nintendo, so too did Mega Man himself. Set one hundred years after the original hero's adventures, Mega Man X stars a more powerful generation of robot known as X who - along with the maverick Zero - must take on a new threat: the reploids. Like Mega Man, X must battle through each thrilling stage and defeat the boss, to capture its weapon for his own. But unlike Mega Man, X can dash, climb walls and collect armour to upgrade his abilities! This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Mega Man™ X
MX.description: Cientos de años después de la muerte del Dr. Light, se ha descubierto su última creación. Liberado de su cápsula por el Dr. Cain, “X" ha nacido en el mundo del futuro, cuando las rebeliones de robots son cosa del pasado. Pero cuando el Dr. Cain trata de poner en práctica los diseños del Dr. Light para usarlos en una nueva gama de reploides algo sale terriblemente mal. Ahora, el futuro está al borde de la destrucción y X debe usar todos sus poderes y habilidades recién descubiertos para dar caza a los rebeldes reploides y a su líder, Sigma, ¡antes de que la raza humana sea destruida por completo!

NO.name: Mega Man™ X
NO.description: When the Mega Man series made the technological leap from NES to Super Nintendo, so too did Mega Man himself. Set one hundred years after the original hero's adventures, Mega Man X stars a more powerful generation of robot known as X who - along with the maverick Zero - must take on a new threat: the reploids. Like Mega Man, X must battle through each thrilling stage and defeat the boss, to capture its weapon for his own. But unlike Mega Man, X can dash, climb walls and collect armour to upgrade his abilities! This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Mega Man™ X
NL.description: Toen de Mega Man-reeks de technologische sprong van NES naar Super Nintendo maakte, werd Mega Man zelf ook een stuk geavanceerder! Honderd jaar na de avonturen van de originele held speelt in Mega Man X een krachtigere robot die bekend staat als X de hoofdrol. Samen met robotjager Zero moet hij het opnemen tegen een nieuwe bedreiging: de reploids. Net als Mega Man moet X zich een weg vechten door spannende levels en eindbazen verslaan om zo unieke wapens te bemachtigen. Maar X kan nu ook rennen, muren beklimmen en pantser verzamelen en daarmee zijn vaardigheden verbeteren! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

LU.name: Mega Man™ X
LU.description: Lorsque la série Mega Man a réalisé le bond technologique de la NES vers la Super Nintendo, Mega Man a lui aussi évolué. Mega Man X se déroule cent ans après les aventures de notre héros d'origine et a pour vedette un robot de nouvelle génération connu sous le nom de X. Avec l'aide du chasseur de rebelles Zero, il doit faire face à une nouvelle menace, les Réploïdes. Tout comme Mega Man, X doit se frayer un chemin à travers chacun des stages excitants puis vaincre le boss afin de s'emparer de son arme. Mais en plus, X peut accélérer, escalader les murs et même améliorer ses capacités ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

RU.name: Mega Man™ X
RU.description: Однажды в судьбе игровой серии Mega Man произошел крутой поворот: игра была портирована с консоли NES™ на Super Nintendo™, платформу с гораздо большими технологическими возможностями. Так появился новый эпизод – Mega Man X. Действие в нем разворачивается через сто лет после событий, которым посвящена первоначальная версия игры. Робот нового поколения Икс, а также охотник на роботов-повстанцев по имени Zero – главные герои этого эпизода. Вместе им предстоит дать отпор новому врагу – реплоидам. Подобно своему предшественнику Mega Man, на каждом уровне игры Икс должен сражаться с полчищами врагов. В конце уровня ему предстоит поединок с главарем реплоидов, победив которого Икс должен завладеть его оружием. Однако, в отличие от Mega Man, Икс может перемещаться в пространстве на огромной скорости, лазать по стенам и собирать доспехи для наращивания боевой мощи. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

PL.name: Mega Man™ X
PL.description: When the Mega Man series made the technological leap from NES to Super Nintendo, so too did Mega Man himself. Set one hundred years after the original hero's adventures, Mega Man X stars a more powerful generation of robot known as X who - along with the maverick Zero - must take on a new threat: the reploids. Like Mega Man, X must battle through each thrilling stage and defeat the boss, to capture its weapon for his own. But unlike Mega Man, X can dash, climb walls and collect armour to upgrade his abilities! This is the US version of the game.

ZA.name: Mega Man™ X
ZA.description: When the Mega Man series made the technological leap from NES to Super Nintendo, so too did Mega Man himself. Set one hundred years after the original hero's adventures, Mega Man X stars a more powerful generation of robot known as X who - along with the maverick Zero - must take on a new threat: the reploids. Like Mega Man, X must battle through each thrilling stage and defeat the boss, to capture its weapon for his own. But unlike Mega Man, X can dash, climb walls and collect armour to upgrade his abilities! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mega Man™ X
PT.description: Quando a série de Mega Man avançou tecnologicamente da NES™ para a Super NES™, o próprio Mega Man acompanhou esta evolução. Cem anos depois das aventuras do herói original, Mega Man X tem como protagonista um robô de uma geração mais poderosa conhecido como X. Com a ajuda de Zero, um Maverick Hunter, terá de lidar com uma nova ameaça: os Reploids. Tal como Mega Man, X terá de lutar em entusiasmantes níveis e derrotar o vilão, de modo a reaver a sua arma. Porém, ao contrário de Mega Man, X consegue correr, escalar paredes e recolher armamento para melhorar as suas capacidades! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.
